65917|AAAI|2006|Compact Convex Upper Bound Iteration for Approximate POMDP Planning|Partially observable Markov decision processes (POMDPs) are an intuitive and general way to model sequential decision making problems under uncertainty. 58119|GECCO|2007|Multiobjective clustering with automatic k-determination for large-scale data|Web mining - data mining for web data - is a key factor of web technologies.
